channel.title: Dementhium 639 - Aggressive NPC's
channel.description: Yeah dumb question, but where would I go to make aggressive npc's? I thought it would be in NPCdefinition.java, but when I checked there I couldn't find anywhere I thought it would go

item.title: Dementhium 639 - Aggressive NPC's
item.dc:creator: @nashyboi1 nashyboi1
item.description:
@nashyboi1 wrote:

open the source folder and go into the NDE folder, then click run.bat and it will open a new program, then type in the npc id u want to make aggressive and then at the bottom right there is 5 boxes that are: melee combat, range combat, mage combat, aggressive and poison immunity, just tick the aggressive box and then click file save and then close, after that make sure you delete the NPCdefinitions.bin file and then compile your server and then the npc should be aggressive.

Not 100% sure this is correct, but pretty sure it is

Read full topic
